original: Kusalaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve mūlāni.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam sekkham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve mūlāni hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Abyākataṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: abyākatam asekkham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo
analyzed: abyākatam nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
